price: Yoo [amma] hin dalagin; fuuldurattis hin dalagdanu; kanaafuu ibidda qabsiisaan ishee namaafi dhagaa ta’e kan kaafirootaaf qopheeffamte sodaadhaa.
arabic: فَإِن لَّمۡ تَفۡعَلُواْ وَلَن تَفۡعَلُواْ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱلنَّارَ ٱلَّتِي وَقُودُهَا ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱلۡحِجَارَةُۖ أُعِدَّتۡ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-in lam tafʿalū walan tafʿalū fa-ittaqū al-nāra allatī waqūduhā al-nāsu wal-ḥijāratu uʿiddat lil'kāfirīna
